remarks: Unequal singleton spans imply nonzero vector subtraction.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lspsnsubn0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnsubn0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspsnsubn0.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lspsnsubn0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lspsnsubn0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspsnsubn0.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspsnsubn0.e $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lspsnsubn0 $p |- ( ph -> ( X .- Y ) =/= .0. ) $.
